contents.title: Vue and Nuxt
contents.description: Bay Clock 3 is built upon VueJS, a progressive javascript framework that builds on basic HTML, JS, and CSS to add reactivity and a more powerful developer experience. Nuxt, in turn, is a VueJS framework that streamlines development, SEO, and deployment

children.value: Bay Clock 3 is built upon VueJS, a progressive javascript framework that builds on basic HTML, JS, and CSS to add reactivity and a more powerful developer experience. Nuxt, in turn, is a VueJS framework that streamlines development, SEO, and deployment
An understanding of HTML, javascript, and JSON is required. I will try to explain each component, page, and function pretty in-depth. However, I reccomend learning the basics of both
(and the composition API) as well as

contents.title: Components
contents.description: Discover every component you can use in your content.

children.value: Discover every component you can use in your content.
Docus reconciles content creators and developers by offering to both the best tools to create and scale content-based websites.

props.code:
::block-hero
---
cta:
  - Get started
  - /get-started
secondary:
  - Open on GitHub →
  - https://github.com/nuxtlabs/docus
snippet: npx nuxi@latest init docus-app -t nuxtlabs/docus-starter
---
#title
Document-driven framework

#description
Docus reconciles content creators and developers by offering to both the best tools to create and scale content-based websites.
::

contents.title: Layouts
contents.description: Docus provides multiple built-in layouts for displaying your Markdown pages.

children.value: Docus provides multiple built-in layouts for displaying your Markdown pages.
The default layout for every page created in the project. This layout renders multiple section alongside the content:

props.code:
---
aside: true
bottom: true
toc: false
---

Your awesome content

children.value: Current page is live sample of default layout.
layout is content focused layout. This layout does not render aside menu of table of contents.
This layout accept some configuration from content front-matter.
in content front-matter the content will be rendered in full width.
: Using this option you can modify layout container look. Like constraining layout width of changing the background.
in front-matter will add horizontal padding in the layout.

props.code:
---
title: Home
layout: page
fluid: true
---

children.value: as live sample of page layout
